Description: Fragment of dark brown wool, plain weave; decorated with lines of supplementary weft in yellow (?) wool; plain weave: warp-brown wool (S/10), weft-dark brown (S/24); supplementary weft: yellow (?) wool (S/paired/1 pick each 3 cm); sewing/possible darning: dark brown wool (S/paired or Z plied); one edge is reinforced selvedge with a cord sewn along it in oversewing (brown wool /S), other edges cut and ragged
